recipes.label: Avoid Opposion
recipes.startdescription: Something seeks us, chases us or challenges us. We could outsmart it with the cunning of Edge or sneak past it with the blessings of the Moth.
recipes.description: Something seeks us, chases us or challenges us. We could outsmart it with the cunning of Edge or sneak past it with the blessings of the Moth.

recipes.label: Devious Tactics
recipes.startdescription: With skullduggery and stirring action, We can outsmart our opposition. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Sly Tactics
recipes.startdescription: With foul play and decisive action, we can outsmart our opposition. We may yet succed.

recipes.label: Tricky Tactics
recipes.startdescription: With dirty tricks and quick action, we can outsmart our opposition. We may yet succeed.

recipes.label: Steps No More
recipes.startdescription: If we move with care and meld with the shadows, we can avoid their attention. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Shadowed Steps
recipes.startdescription: If we move with care and cling to the shadows, we can avoid their gaze. We are likely to succeed.

recipes.label: Silken Footsteps
recipes.startdescription: If we move with care and stick to the shadows, we can avoid their grasp. We may yet succeed.
